A

  • arctanh_transform

B

  • band_pass_filtering
  • bet_binary_mask (str)
  • binarization type = float, default = 0.0, [1], [2], [3]

C

  • c_thresh type = float, default = 0.2
  • cleanup_fsl type = boolean, default = True
  • compress type = boolean, default = True, [1]
  • confounds (str, optional)
  • connectivity_matrix (str)
  • correct_path_distribution type = boolean, default = True
  • cubic_transform

D

  • dist_thresh type = float, default = 5.0
  • dMRI
  • downsample_to

F

  • figure_format type = string, default = png

G

  • grouping

I

  • inv_xfm (str)

K

  • k
  • kmeans

L

  • loop_check type = boolean, default = True
  • low_variance_error

M

  • median_filtering, [1]

N

  • n_clusters type = list[integer], default = [], required
  • n_samples type = integer, default = 5000
  • n_steps type = integer, default = 2000

P

  • participants
  • pca_transform, [1]

R

  • rCBP
  • remove_seed, [1]
  • ROI
  • rsfMRI

S

  • samples (str)
  • seed_coordinates (str)
  • seed_mask (str)
  • smoothing
  • step_length type = float, default = 0.5
  • subsampling type = boolean, default = True

  • target_mask (str)
  • time_series (str)
